visual_attributes.lighting: Natural light with recessed ceiling lights

indian_context.regional_style: Not clearly regional, but elements hint at a modern take on Indian aesthetics
traditional_elements: Minimal use of traditional Indian furniture styles
modern_adaptations: Integration of contemporary furniture with Indian material choices
indian_context.space_utilization: Efficient layout with functional areas like a workspace

analysis.description: This living room space showcases a contemporary Indian fusion style, featuring modern furniture with a touch of traditional Indian aesthetics. The use of neutral colors and minimalist decor provides a clean and sophisticated look, while the incorporation of natural wood and marble floors maintains a connection to Indian design principles. The room is functional, with a workspace area, and utilizes space efficiently, creating a modern yet homely atmosphere.

metadata.budget_indicator: Moderate to high, with the use of high-quality materials like marble and wood
metadata.indian_specific: Modern Indian design elements with a focus on functionality and minimalism
